job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pSenior Machine LearningAI EngineerppbrppExperience 710 YearsppLocation  BangaloreppSalary  3035 LacsppImmediate Joiner or those who are serving Notice Period can applyppbrppOverview With Technical SkillsppbrppSAS Platform Programming Developerpp Have 7 years of professional experience in machine learning or quantitative analysis or have a PhD in Computer Science Statistics Mathematics or Physicspp Have excellent programming and algorithmic skillspp Are proficient with Python and experience with data processing tools eg SciPy NumPy Pandas PyTorch and Apache Sparkpp Have an indepth understanding of supervised and unsupervised machine learning algorithms Knowledge of engineering causal models and convolutional neural networks a big pluspp Have proven track record of deploying learning algorithms in a production systempp Have demonstrated endtoend ownership of projectspp Have stellar listening and explanation skillsppbrppKey Responsibilitiespp Deliver stateoftheart causal algorithms to production for optimizing consumer product metricspp Build and maintain the infrastructure for data and model managementpp Work closely with the Turing design and engineering teams for machine learningadjacent components such as visualization adhoc data analysis and data processingpp Give talks write blog posts and produce peerreviewed publicationspp Define and lead the development of longerterm Turing Platform capabilitiesppbrppCompensation amp Perkspp Remotefriendly work environmentpp Collaborative culturepp Mentorship from machine learning pioneerspp Competitive salary with generous equity You get to join the company at the most advantageous stagepp Directly impact the growth of the companypp Play a significant role in strategizing the product roadmappp Reimbursement of homeoffice setupp
